description: Users may experience unexpected behavior in Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 126.0.2592.56 due to a type confusion error caused by an underlying vulnerability in the Chromium open-source software. This could manifest as intermittent crashes, freezing, or corrupted web page rendering when visiting certain websites. Additionally, users may notice performance degradation during the browsing session, leading to slower response times or unresponsive tabs. It is important that users update to the latest version, which is version 126.0.6478.57, to mitigate these issues and ensure stable functionality. The KB article related to this is KB-126.0.2592.56, which details the resolution of this security concern.
